author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1851: Modify jest-instance.xsd to match attribute category

author: marvin
msg: Fix two bugs which had mostly canceled each other out.  JSON::XS was being fed
a scalar without the UTF8 flag set and thus was producing data structures with
non-UTF8 scalars.  XSBind_perl_hash_to_cfish_hash was using UTF-8 byte
validity instead of the UTF8 flag when turning scalars into CharBufs.

author: spamassassin_role
msg: updated scores for revision 1037136 active rules added since last mass-check
